refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies the objects specified to the keep_file.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Copies the objects specified to the keep_file. If keep_file does not exist, it is created. If keep_file does exist, the objects are appended to it. The keep_file is a BRL-CAD database file. The objects in the list must exist in the current database.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the keep command to copy specified objects to a designated file.

example.title: Copy specified objects to a designated file.

listitem.para: Creates sample.g file with objects sample1 and sample2 in it.
